title: Essential Guide to NVIDIA GPU Operator in Kubernetes
author: Sameer Kulkarni; Sanket Sudake
description: What is NVIDIA GPU Operator? Learn its installation, features, and how it manages GPU resources efficiently in Kubernetes environments to scale AI/ML workloads.
